* Generated by regular grammars
* Represented by regular expression
* Accepted by finite state accepters

## Regular Expressions
* Semantically different with RegEx in programming languages.

| Symbol | Usage             |
| ------ | ----------------- |
| *      | O or more         |
| +      | 1 or more         |
| ?      | 0 or 1 appearance |
| ()     | Grouping          |
| []     | Range             |
| ,      | OR                |
